meanings.sent1: The sun overlights the entire garden.
meanings.sent2: The chandelier overlights the dining room beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The firefly overlights the night with its tiny glow.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse overlights the rocky shore, guiding ships safely.
meanings.sent5: The full moon overlights the dark forest, casting a magical glow.

meanings.definition: A source of light from above.
meanings.sent1: The skylight is an overlights in the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the sky are natural overlights at night.
meanings.sent3: The streetlamp overlights the path for nighttime walkers.
meanings.sent4: The flashlight became our only overlights in the dark cave.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse serves as a crucial overlights for ships in the stormy sea.
